other_tests.findings: Significant and stable control of tremor and ataxia improvement over time, providing functional gain in daily life activities.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Effects persisted 30 months later, with demonstrated improvement on pre- and post-DBS tremor and ataxia scales.

other_tests.findings: FMR1 gene premutation: a demethylated fragment of 3.1 Kb corresponding to 150â€“200 CGG repeats.
Revealed typical thalamic activity and upper subthalamic nucleus activity; the central channel was roughly silent below the thalamus.
